disclaimer.title: Accept Disclaimer
disclaimer.text: These steps involves the creation of a new account. The procedure consists of complex cryptographic operations that use a PASSPHRASE (a series of 15 random words) to create your UNIQUE ACCOUNT ADDRESS . This PASSPHRASE is extremely important and must be kept in safe place, since it's THE ONLY WAY to access your account. If you lose it you lose access to your account and your funds! The Foundation holds no responsibility for lost funds resulting from misplaced passphrases. The account passphrase and other vital information must be immediately saved and written down for your own safety. Make sure that you select the entire passphrase length before keeping it and check again your account address by logging in and compare the account address with the account address generated from this PASSPHRASE here before making your first transfer. Please proceed only if you understand and accept this disclaimer.

passphrase.title: Generate Passphrase
passphrase.note: Make sure that you keep the passphrase safe. If you lose your passphrase later on, your account can't be restored and all your funds will be lost. Write down your passphrase in the next step you will be asked to re-type it for confirmation.

confirm.title: Confirm PassPhrase and Sign In
confirm.note: Make sure that you keep the passphrase safe. If you lose your passphrase later on, your account can't be restored and all your funds will be lost. On your first sign in compare the account address shown in account details with the one you have written down during this new account creation and verify they match.

login.title: Please enter your Passphrase
login.note: Note: Every transaction will get signed locally and transmitted to a random node without revealing your wallet passphrase or private keys.

footer.content1: This app is owned by the

account.account-address-tooltip: This is your unique account ID.
account.confirmed-balance-tooltip: This is your confirmed account balance.
account.unconfirmed-balance-tooltip: This balance includes amounts on pending orders. For instance buy/sell orders.
account.effective-balance-tooltip: This balance is used for block generation calculation and shows only amounts with +1'440 confirmations. This is the balance used also for balance leasing.
account.earned-fees-balance-tooltip: This balance shows your accumulated block fee reward on generated blocks by this account.
account.balance-assets-tooltip: Assets balance based on the last trade for each asset this accounts holds.
account.balance-currencies-tooltip: Currencies balance based on the last trade for each currency this accounts holds.
account.balance-total-tooltip: The total balance including assets and currencies for this acocunt.
account.fiat-balance-account-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-assets-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-currencies-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.fiat-balance-total-tooltip: Fiat money equivalent, based on last completed trade on XIN exchange.
account.account-name-tooltip: The public account name for this account.
account.account-description-tooltip: The public account description for this account.

send-xin.number-blocks-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed without further approvement after this number of blocks
send-xin.reference-full-hash-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed if this transaction hash is included into the blockchain
send-xin.secret-hash-tooltip: Your transaction will be executed if this secret hash is included into the blockchain
send-xin.recipient-tooltip: The recipient account to send token to.
send-xin.amount-tooltip: The amount you like to send to the recipient account.
send-xin.alias-connect-tooltip: Enter an alias connected to an account to get the account Id.
send-xin.open-bookmark-tooltip: Open your bookmarks to insert an account id
send-xin.message-field-tooltip: For message encryption the recipient public key needs to be known. This is not the case for accounts without any outbound transaction.
send-xin.public-key-field-tooltip: Additional security for brand new accounts without any outbound transaction and mandatory for encrypted messages to accounts without a known public key.

receive-xin.only-send-xin-text: Only send XIN to this address
receive-xin.other-digital-lable: Sending any other digital asset,including Bitcoin Cash and USDT, will result in permanent loss.
receive-xin.transaction-full-hash-tooltip: To claim a secret transaction you have to enter the transaction full hash.
receive-xin.revealed-secret-tooltip: Enter the secret from sender to claim your transaction before the transaction expires.

control.minimum-approval-account-lable-popover: The amount you like to send to the recipient account.
control.quorum-greater-smg: Quorum must be greater than equal to 2
control.quorum-less-smg: Quorum must be less than equal to 9

balance-lease.message-field-popover: For message encryption the recipient public key has to be known.
balance-lease.public-key-field-popover: Additional security for brand new accounts without any outbound transaction.
balance-lease.block-duration-popover: 1.440 Blocks are equal one day. Range from min. 1'440 to max. 65'535 Blocks
balance-lease.recipient-popover: This account will receive your balance mining power for block duration specified right side.
balance-lease.duration-greater-or-equal-msg: Duration must be greater than equal to 1440.
balance-lease.duration-less-or-equal-msg: Duration must be less than equal to 65535

search-account.search-for-account-popover: Enter word(s) to search for accounts with info and description.

properties.recipient-lable-popover: The recipient account for this property.
properties.won-property-popover: Set property on your own account

block-generation.block-generation-note: To generate blocks your passphrase is used to sign blocks. For security reasons block generation is only available on your local node or a manual node (preferably your own trusted node and set in options - connection mode).
block-generation.local-node-available-popover: To generate blocks your passphrase is used to sign blocks. For security reasons block generation is only available on your local node.
block-generation.status-popover: The block generation status on your local node.
block-generation.secret-phrase-popover: Ensure you are running a local node before enter your passphrase to prevent security risks. You can switch over anytime to a local node by choosing LOCAL_HOST for connection mode in options.

funding-monitor.control-tab-note: To start the funding monitor your passphrase is used to sign transactions. For security reasons the funding monitor is only available on your local node or a manual node (preferably your own trusted node and set in options/connection mode).
funding-monitor.account-property-popover: The name of the account property.
funding-monitor.amount-popover: The amount (token/shares/currency) to fund the recipient account with.
funding-monitor.threshold-popover: The threshold which triggers the funding.
funding-monitor.interval-popover: The number of blocks to wait after before funding the recipient (min. 10).
funding-monitor.holding-type-popover: Holding types are token, assets or currencies.
funding-monitor.admin-password-popover: The admin password entered in your node.
funding-monitor.secret-phrase-popover: Ensure you are running a local node before enter your passphrase to prevent security risks. You can switch over anytime to a local node by choosing LOCAL_HOST for connection mode in options.

send-message.title: Send Message
send-message.recipient-label-popover: The account you like to send an encrypted message to.
send-message.type-label-popover: ON chain or OFF chain. Non-prunable with max. 160 chars or prunable messages with max. 42Kb. Prunable messages are deleted after two weeks.
send-message.message-label-popover: Encrypted messages with max. 160 characters unless prunable which is max. 42Kb.
send-message.recipient-public-key-label-popover: Additional security for brand new accounts without any outbound transaction and mandatory for encrypted messages to accounts without a known public key.

transfer-currency.title: Transfer Currency Details
transfer-currency.recipient-popover: The recipient for this currency transfer.
transfer-currency.units-popover: Number of units for this transfer.
transfer-currency.units-greater-msg: Units must be greater than equal to 0

delete-currency.title: Delete Currency Details
delete-currency.currency-delete-note: Currencies can be deleted only if all units are in issuer possession.

exchange-offer.title: Exchange Offer Details
exchange-offer.note: An exchange offer models real world exchange booth, offering to exchange currencies at different buy/sell rates and limits. If you only want to buy, or only to sell, leave the opposite limits at 0, and enter the same buy and sell rates.
exchange-offer.buy-rate-popover: The rate per currency unit at which you are buying.
exchange-offer.buy-rate-greater-msg: Buy Rate must be greater than equal to 0
exchange-offer.sell-rate-popover: The rate per currency unit at which you are selling.
exchange-offer.sell-rate-greater-msg: Sell Rate must be greater than equal to 0
exchange-offer.buy-limit-popover: For offers with buy and sell, if you sell some of the currency, and then buy some again, you can put a limit to the overall total number of units bought. This total limit cannot be less than the initial number of units to buy.
exchange-offer.buy-limit-greater-msg: Buy Limit must be greater than equal to 0
exchange-offer.sell-limit-popover: For offers with buy and sell, if you sell some of the currency, and then buy some again, you can put a limit to the overall total number of units bought. This total limit cannot be less than the initial number of units to buy.
exchange-offer.sell-limit-greater-msg: Sell Limit must be greater than equal to 0
exchange-offer.inital-buy-supply-popover: Number of currency units you want to buy.
exchange-offer.inital-buy-supply-greater-msg: Inital Buy Supply must be greater than equal to 0
exchange-offer.inital-sell-supply-popover: Number of currency units you want to sell.
exchange-offer.inital-sell-supply-greater: Inital Sell Supply must be greater than equal to 0

trade-desk.title: Trade Desk
trade-desk.sell-note: No open sell offers. You cannot buy this currency now, but you could publish an exchange offer instead, and wait for others to fill it.
trade-desk.buy-note: No open buy offers. You cannot sell this currency now, but you could publish an exchange offer instead, and wait for others to fill it.

currency-buy-offer.title: Currency Buy Offer Details
currency-buy-offer.rate-popover: The rate per currency unit at which you are buying.
currency-buy-offer.rate-greater: Rate must be greater than equal to 0
currency-buy-offer.units-popover: Number of currency units you want to buy.
currency-buy-offer.units-greater: Units Supply must be greater than equal to 0

currency-sell-offer.title: Currency Sell Offer Details
currency-sell-offer.rate-popover: The rate per currency unit at which you are selling.
currency-sell-offer.rate-greater: Rate must be greater than equal to 0
currency-sell-offer.units-popover: Number of currency units you want to buy.
currency-sell-offer.units-greater: Units must be greater than equal to 0

issue-currency.title: Issue Currency
issue-currency.name-popover: The currency name is unique. Should be between 3-10 characters and longer than the currency code. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
issue-currency.name-at-least: Name must contain at least the 3 characters
issue-currency.code-popover: The currency code is unique. Its composed of 3-6 upper case letters. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
issue-currency.code-at-least: Code must contain at least 3 characters
issue-currency.description-popover: Currency description with max. 1.000 characters. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
issue-currency.currency-type-popover: Exchangable, can be exchanged with XIN. Controllable; transfers only from, to issuer. Exchange offers allowed only from issuer.
issue-currency.currency-decimals-popover: The maximum allowed number of digits after the asset quantity decimal point.
issue-currency.currency-decimals-greater: Currency Decimals must be greater than equal to 0
issue-currency.currency-decimals-less: Currency Decimals must be less than equal to 4
issue-currency.initial-supply-popover: The initial currency supply. Multiplied by number of decimals gives the smalles currency unit to trade or transfer.
issue-currency.initial-supply-greater: Initial Supply must be greater than equal to 1
issue-currency.total-supply-popover: Total currency supply used for reservable/claimable currencies like crowdfunding token. For all other currency type total supply has to be equal to initial supply.

search-currencies.title: Search Currencies
search-currencies.search-account-info-popover: Enter word(s) to search for accounts with info and description.

send-currency.title: Send Currency Details
send-currency.units-popover: The number of units to send.

common.open-bookmark-tooltip: Open your bookmarks to insert an account id
common.alias-connect-tooltip: Enter an alias connected to an account to get the account Id.
common.price-greater: Price must be greater than equal to 0
common.quantity-greater: Quantity must be greater than equal to 0
common.expiration-height-popover: Block height at which this offer expires.
common.expiration-height-greater: Expiration Height must be greater than equal to
common.expiration-height-less: Expiration Height must be less than equal to 14400

issue-asset.title: Issue Asset
issue-asset.asset-name-popover: The asset name is UNIQUE. Should be between 3 and 16 characters long. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
issue-asset.asset-description-popover: Asset descriptions with max. 1.000 characters. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
issue-asset.asset-quantity-popover: The number of shares for this asset.
issue-asset.asset-decimals-popover: The maximum allowed number of digits after the asset quantity decimal point.

search-assets.title: Search Assets
search-assets.search-popover: Enter word(s) to search for assets with info and description.

delete-shares.title: Delete Shares Details
delete-shares.number-shares-delete-popover: The number of shares to be deleted.

dividend-payment.title: Dividend Payment Details
dividend-payment.amount-per-share-popover: The dividend in XIN for EACH share. If you have a total to pay, divide it by the number of total shares.
dividend-payment.height-popover: The blockchain height at which asset holders shares will be counted (must be less than 1440 blocks in the past).

expected-order-details.title: Expected Order Details
expected-order-details.asset-id-popover: get expected orders for this asset id.

transfer-asset.title: Transfer Asset Details
transfer-asset.recipient-popover: The recipient account you like to transfer asset shares
transfer-asset.shares-popover: The number of shares you like to transfer. Fractions are calculated by decimals for this assets.

trade-desk.title: Trade Desk
trade-desk.name: Name
trade-desk.price-value-validation-text: Price must be greater than equal to 0

create-poll.title: Create Poll
create-poll.voting-model-popover: Choose the voting model by account, each account has one vote. Balance, each account is weighted by it's balance. Asset is weighted by account asset balance and currency by account currency balance. You can also limit the voters by adding a minimum XIN balance needed to vote.
create-poll.minimum-voter-balance-popover: Enter the minimum account balance needed to vote on this poll.

create-alias.title: Create Alias
create-alias.alias-name-popover: Alias with max. 100 characters. Aliases are CASE-INSENSITIVE.
create-alias.prefix-popover: Alias prefix to connect your alias with.
create-alias.url-popover: The resource or target you like to connect your alias with. Can be your account, a website or even a BTC address. For URL ensure your uri starts with http://

cancel-alias-sell.title: Cancel Alias Sell Details
cancel-alias-sell.sales-price-popover: The current sale price for this alias

edit-alias.title: Edit Alias Details
edit-alias.current-uri-popover: The current resource your aliase is pointing to
edit-alias.prefix-popover: Aliase prefix you like to connect your alias with
edit-alias.new-uri-popover: The resource or target you like to connect your alias with, can be your account, a website or event a BTC address. For URL ensure your uri start with http://

transfer-alias.title: Transfer Alias Details
transfer-alias.uri-popover: The current resource this alias is pointing to
transfer-alias.recipient-account-popover: The recipient account for this alias transfer

sell-alias.title: Sell Alias Details
sell-alias.uri-popover: The current resource your aliase is pointing to
sell-alias.recipient-private-sell-popover: You can sell your alias to public or to a specific account. Enter a recipient account for a private sell or leave free for a public sell
sell-alias.recipient-placeholder: Recipient for private or empty for public sell.
sell-alias.price-popover: The price you want sell this alias

delete-alias.title: Delete Alias Details
delete-alias.uri-popover: The current resource your aliase is pointing to

create-at.title: Create AT
create-at.at-name-popover: The AT name. Min. 3 max. 30 chars. AT names are unique!
create-at.at-name-greater: Name must be greater than equal to 3 chars
create-at.minimum-activation-amount-popover: This defines the minimum transaction amount this specific AT will be able to see. All transactions below that amount are blind to the AT and will be ignored.
create-at.minimum-activation-amount-greater: Minimum activation amount must be greater than equal to 0
create-at.minimum-activation-amount-less: Minimum activation amount must be less than equal to 100
create-at.description-popover: A description about your AT. Max. 1.000 chars.
create-at.code-popover: This is where you place your AT code.
create-at.code-greater: Code must be greater than equal to 10 chars
create-at.machine-data-btn-popover: This is the data space of the AT, or the -harddisk- for simplicity.
create-at.data-popover: This is the size of the memory to allocate for your AT. The memory in AT is working on chunks of 256 bytes which we call pages. If you don’t define any data in the Data field above, because you don’t have any initial values to define, but you still need to allocate memory, this is where you do it. For instance, if you want to add 1024 bytes of memory for the AT then you need to set the Data Pages field to 4. Each page is 256 bytes.
create-at.pages-greater: Data(No. of pages) must be greater than equal to 0
create-at.pages-less: Data(No. of pages) must be less than equal to 10
create-at.call-stack-popover: Call stack memory. This will only be used in specific situations, if your code is using PUSH/POP commands, for example. It’s extra memory to allocate to the AT.
create-at.call-stack-required: Call stack(No. of pages) is required
create-at.call-stack-greater: Call stack(No. of pages) must be greater than equal to 0
create-at.call-stack-less: Call stack(No. of pages) must be less than equal to 10
create-at.user-stack-popover: User stack memory. This will only be used in specific situations, if your code is using PUSH/POP commands, for example. It’s extra memory to allocate to the AT.
create-at.user-stack-required: User stack(No. of pages) is required
create-at.user-stack-greater: User stack(No. of pages) must be greater than equal to 0
create-at.user-stack-less: User stack(No. of pages) must be less than equal to 10

create-campaign.title: Create Campaign
create-campaign.name-popover: The campaign name is unique. Should be between 3-10 characters and longer than the campaign code. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
create-campaign.name-at-least: Name must contain at least the 3 characters
create-campaign.code-popover: The campaign code is unique. Its composed of 3-6 upper case letters. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
create-campaign.code-at-least: Code must contain at least 3 characters
create-campaign.description-popover: Campaign description with max. 1.000 characters. Once submitted, you will not be able to change this information again, ever. Make sure it is correct.
create-campaign.initial-supply-popover: The initial campaign supply. These units remains to campaign issuer.
create-campaign.initial-supply-greater: Initial Supply must be greater than equal to 0
create-campaign.reserve-supply-popover: The reserve campaign supply. Subsctracted by initial supply those units are distributed among founders.
create-campaign.reserve-supply-greater: Reserve Supply must be greater than 0
create-campaign.min-amount-popover: The amount of XIN to raise for EACH unit of reserve supply. Total amount to raise is this amount multiplied by reserve supply.
create-campaign.min-amount-required: Min. Amount per Unit is required
create-campaign.min-amount-greater: Min. Amount per Unit must be greater than 0
create-campaign.total-amount-raise-popover: The amount of XIN to raise in total for your campaign.
create-campaign.issuance-height-popover: Your campaign ends after this number of blocks
create-campaign.issuance-height-greater: Issuance Height must be greater than equal to 1440
create-campaign.issuance-height-less: Issuance Height must be less than equal to 43200

reserve-campaign.title: Reserve Campaign Details
reserve-campaign.campaign-specification-popover: The reserve supply in units, the minimum reserve per unit and the unit decimals
reserve-campaign.campaign-goal-popover: The total amount of XIN to raise for this campaign
reserve-campaign.total-amount-to-reserve-popover: The total amount of XIN you want to reserve
reserve-campaign.amount-per-unit-popover: The amount per unit based on former total amount to reserve

create-subscription.title: Create Subscription
create-subscription.recipient-popover: The recipient account to send token to
create-subscription.amount-popover: The amount you like to send to the recipient account.
create-subscription.amount-greater: Amount must be greater than equal to 0
create-subscription.interval-days-greater: Interval in days must be greater than equal to 0.0417
create-subscription.interval-days-less: Interval in days is must be less than equal to 365

create-escrow.title: Create Escrow
create-escrow.recipient-popover: The recipient account to send token to
create-escrow.amount-popover: The amount you like to send to the recipient account.
create-escrow.days-until-expiration-popover: Your escrow will expire without approval after this number of days.Min. 1, max. 90
create-escrow.decision-model-popover: Choose decision model after escrow expiration.

sign-escrow.title: Sign Escrow Details
sign-escrow.escrow-id-popover: The escrow ID for sign for
sign-escrow.decision-model-popover: The signing decision for this escrow
